response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 7200}
